name: ELECTRIFIED
description:
Electrified is a simple 2D platformer.
Use jump and dash to run around the world of Eleton!

Nova's mission is to recover all the Prisum Cubes.
The playground is a lot of fun, but beware of the needles and saws.

-- Install instructions --
Unzip the folder and launch [ELECTRIFIED.exe]

-- Features --
* Available only for Windows(64bit)
* Duration is about 60 min
* Only for Xbox 360 Controller (Others not verified)

-- Controls --

If you like the game, we will really appreciate it if you can share or even stream the game.
